程序包 main

类 Elevator

java.lang.Object
main.Elevator
public class Elevator extends Object

  • 字段概要

    字段
    修饰符和类型
    字段
    说明
    static int
    maxOccupants
    This specifies the number of people that can be brought to their floors by an Elevator instance at any given time.

  • 构造器概要

    构造器
    构造器
    说明
    Elevator(main.Building building)
    Constructs a new Elevator object at the lobby.

  • 字段详细资料

    • maxOccupants

      public static int maxOccupants
      This specifies the number of people that can be brought to their floors by an Elevator instance at any given time.

      DO NOT REMOVE THIS FIELD

      You may edit it. But keep it public.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Elevator

      public Elevator(main.Building building)
      Constructs a new Elevator object at the lobby.
      参数:
      building - Building the Building object that this elevator belongs to.

  • 方法详细资料

    • getCurrentFloor

      public int getCurrentFloor()
      Obtains the current floor location of a Drone object.
      返回:
      currentFloor integer the current floor location that the drone is currently at.

    • createJob

      public void createJob(main.Person person, int floor)
      Creates a job for the elevator.
      参数:
      person - Person a Person object that requested an elevator.
      floor - integer the person's desired floor number.

    • processAllJobs

      public void processAllJobs()
      Starts the elevator to complete all the jobs and send people to their desired floors.

    • processJob

      public void processJob(main.Job job)
      Processes a job, and move the elevator stop by stop in order to reach the desired stop.
      参数:
      job - Job the job to be processed.

    • exit

      public void exit(main.Person person, int floor)
      Enables a person to leave the elevator and then enter a floor.
      参数:
      person - Person a Person object in this elevator.
      floor - integer the person's desired floor number.

    • getJob

      public main.Job[] getJob()
      Obtains the Job array of an Elevator object.
      返回:
      jobs Job[] the array of Job objects that this elevator needs to complete.

    • toSrting

      public String toSrting()
      Standardizes the output format for Elevator object.
      返回:
      String the floor location of this Person object, always is "Elevator at Lobby" or "Elevator at floor " + this.currentFloor.
